record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 695 AND ADDED AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 1222

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that Mrs. Emerson be removed as a cosponsor of H.R. 695 and added as a cosponsor of H.R. 1222. I regret the error.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maryland?
